name: YHA Melbourne Central
description:
Located in the heart of the city, friendly YHA Melbourne Central. With free and fast Wi-Fi throughout the hostel and staff ready to answer your questions. The hostel offers modern facilities as well as an amazing rooftop complete with BBQ for you to enjoy the city views and meet new friends. 

Reception open 24 hours.

On the ground floor and decked out in Melbourne's urban cool style, you'll find our air-conditioned reception, lounge, self-catering kitchen, and a TV room. Upstairs, choose from a range of rooms including multi-share and private rooms with optional ensuite and exclusive rooftop private rooms. All rooms have lift access. Bed linen is included for all rooms and each bed has individual reading lights. 

There's always plenty to do in Australia's sport and events capital! YHA Melbourne Central is only a short walk to Melbourne's main attractions including Federation Square, ACMI, Yarra River, Bourke St Mall, Eureka Skydeck, Melbourne Convention and Exhibition Centre, Docklands, Crown Casino, Etihad Stadium, National Gallery of Victoria, Melbourne Aquarium and so much more. The free City Circle Tram stops directly out the front of the hostel and will take you to all the iconic Melbourne sites like the MCG, the Shrine of Remembrance and Rod Laver Arena. 

Any group booking of 10 or more people must book directly with YHA. We do not accept group bookings through this website. 

Please note that this property cannot accommodate guests under the age of 18. 

Book a room at YHA Melbourne Central and experience Melbourne for yourself!

A valid photo ID, VISA or Mastercard Debit is required on check-in.

houseRules.notes:
Please inform YHA Melbourne Central in advance of your expected arrival time.

Guests are required to show photo identification and credit card upon check-in. 

We require taking a profile photo of all guests staying in shared rooms or private rooms with a shared bathroom. If you do not wish to have your photo taken, we will not be able to accommodate you.

Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or legal guardian.

The supervision of guests under 18 years of age remains the responsibility of their parent or legal guardian whilst at a YHA property. Guests under 18 years of age are not permitted to stay in Co-living shared dormitory rooms, they can only be accommodated in private rooms. For further information on the YHA child safety policy please contact the property directly.

Cancellation Policy: - 
Non-refundable rate:
Your credit card will be charged for your full stay at the time of the booking.
Bookings are completely non-refundable and non-transferable.

Fully Flexible:
Your credit card will be charged for your full stay on the day of your arrival*.
Full refund or cancellation until 2pm on day of arrival.
Free change or cancellation prior to 2PM on arrival date.
Cancellations made after 2PM on arrival date or failure to check-in will result in a charge equivalent to one-nights' stay.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
